ticket_informations.exchangeable: Time/date changes permitted at any time for the difference in fare. Changes subject to availability

conditions.label: Time/date changes permitted at any time for the difference in fare. Changes subject to availability
Time/date changes permitted at any time for the difference in fare. Changes subject to availability
If you cancel a refund is permitted, subject to recalculation of the fare for any journey flown. There are no cancellation fees.
